author: Dion Rabouin
title: Coronavirus has hit American farmers from all sides
description: U.S. farmers are fighting for their livelihoods as the coronavirus pandemic slashes commodity values, cuts off supply chains and closes markets around the globe to their products.Why it matters: Farmers are at the center of industries being hardest hit by the…
content:
U.S. farmers are fighting for their livelihoods as the coronavirus pandemic slashes commodity values, cuts off supply chains and closes markets around the globe to their products.
